form.label: MikroTik Web Proxy
form.description: Shows http request going trough Web proxy. Https are not logged.

search.query: `index` sourcetype=mikrotik module="web-proxy" src_ip="$src_ip$" action="$action$" host="$Host$" | eval host_name=coalesce(identity,host) | table _time host src_ip action url host_name
| eval data=host | stats count by data host_name | eval info=host_name."-".data." (".count.")" | sort -count

| lookup dnslookup clientip as src_ip OUTPUT clienthost as src_host | eval src_host=coalesce(src_host,src_ip) ,src_ip_split=split(src_ip,".") ,l_ip=mvindex(src_ip_split,3) | top limit=0 src_host src_ip l_ip | eval info=src_host.".".l_ip." (".count.")" | sort - count
| eval data=action | stats count by data | eval info=data." (".count.")" | sort -count

| lookup dnslookup clientip as src_ip OUTPUT clienthost as src_host | eval src_host=if(isnull(src_host),src_ip,src_host) ,site_split=split(url,"/") ,To_count=mvcount(site_split) ,url2=mvindex(site_split,2) ,site_split2=split(url2,".") ,To_count2=mvcount(site_split2) ,site_dom=mvindex(site_split2,To_count2-1) ,site_info=mvindex(site_split2,To_count2-2) | rex field=url2 "(?<test>\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)" | eval site_info = if(isnotnull(test),test,site_info) | top src_ip src_host $site$ action limit=0
